title: How to reduce lag?
body:
I've been lagging ever since I started playing League, I've tried a bunch of methods like turning the graphics down and things like that. 

But the lag just never really goes away. In most of my games i have around 300-400 ping, and in a lot of games I have 1000 to 4000 

ping. I even had around 7 or 8 games where im over 10000 or 20000 ping. I only have ping under 100 in some games. It makes it 

really hard to play the game. Does anyone have any ways of stopping lag? It would really help me. Thanks.

replies.body:
Graphics settings definitely won't have any affect on your connection to the server. Huge inconsistencies in your latency (ping) to the server are generally caused by issues along your route to the server, either by pathing changes by the ISP or local network settings. The guide that *Rineyy* linked is a good place to start in order to resolve this. 

If you still see issues with your latency after following those steps, please reach back out to me about this.
